pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Dispersion Index (SDI) Family of Metrics for Spatial/Geographic Networks // Spatial Dispersion Index (SDI) is a generalized measurement index, or rather a family of indices to evaluate spatial dispersion of movements/flows in a network in a problem neutral way as described in: Gencer (2023) doi:10.1007/s12061-023-09545-8. This package computes and optionally visualizes this index with minimal hassle.
